grid.text: 4. Jump on the dais' R. side
4. Kneel and turn the hammer inward
4. Still kneeling, suddenly straighten himself. Point to the waki
6. Waki stands up and goes to 4
4. Waki joins the Shite on the dais
4. Waki takes the sword and hold it at shoulder's level
(Waki takes the sword and hold it at shoulder's level)
4. Waki lays the blade on the anvil
(R. leap turn outisde the dais, hammer pointed down.)
4. L. R. L. R. Down Head
4. Waki L. R. L. Head motion and then looks ahead.

captions.translation: [SHITE] A young boy ascends the forge mound!
captions.transcription: [SHITE] Tōnan dan no ue ni agari.

captions.translation: [JIUTAI] A young boy ascends the forge mound,
captions.transcription: [JIUTAI] Tōnan dan no ue ni agatte,
captions.japaneseScript: ［地謡］童男壇の。上にあがつて

captions.translation: kneels and bows three times before Munechika.
captions.transcription: Munechika ni sanpai no hiza wo kusshi.
captions.japaneseScript: 宗近に三拝の膝を屈し。

captions.translation: "Now then, the metal for the blade?" he says
captions.transcription: Sate mitsurugi no kane wa to ieba
captions.japaneseScript: 扨御剣の。鉄はと問へば

captions.translation: and Munechika, his heart joyful, in reply
captions.transcription: Munechika mo kyōet'n no kokoro wo saki toshite
captions.japaneseScript: 宗近も恐悦の心をさきとして

captions.translation: As he strikes the first blow with his mallet,
captions.transcription: Oshie no tsuchi wo hattate uteba.
captions.japaneseScript: 教の鎚をはつたと打てば。

captions.translation: [JIUTAI] The blows coming, one on another, the sound of their mallets
echoes throughout heaven and earth - How it resounds!
captions.japaneseScript: 天地に聞こえて おびたゝしや
